title: Mark Appleyard in Bacon
description:
Mark Appleyard from our skate team getting creative on and off his board.

Apples mark in skateboarding is well defined. He was the Thrasher Magazine Skater of the Year in 2003, 2004 TransWorld SKATEboarding Readers' Choice winner and 2007 TransWorld Skateboarding Best Street Skater winner. After being in the game for more than 10 years, Apples has the respect of the skate community and continues to have fun as he makes things happen on his board.

In this clip, Apples is wearing the Bacon. They're super tasty, just like our favorite food.
